trans-unit.source: Decrypts Optimal Asymmetric Encryption Padding (OAEP) key exchange data.
trans-unit.target: Dekrypterer optimale asymmetrisk kryptering fylle (OAEP) nøkkelutvekslingen data.

trans-unit.source: Key exchange allows a sender to create secret information, for example, random data that can be used as a key in a symmetric encryption algorithm, and use encryption to send it to the intended recipient.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelens utvekslingsnøkkel tillater avsenderen om å opprette hemmelig informasjon, for eksempel, tilfeldig data som kan brukes som en nøkkel i en symmetriske krypteringsalgoritmen og bruker kryptering for å sende den til den tiltenkte mottakeren.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAOAEPKeyExchangeFormatter> to create the key exchange message with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Bruk <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAOAEPKeyExchangeFormatter>til å opprette nøkkelens utvekslingsnøkkel-melding med den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>algoritmen.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAOAEPKeyExchangeFormatter>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > It is highly recommended that you not attempt to create your own key exchange method from the basic functionality provided, because many details of the operation must be performed carefully in order for the key exchange to be successful.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Det anbefales at du ikke prøver å opprette nøkkelutvekslingen metoden fra grunnleggende funksjonaliteten, fordi mange detaljene for operasjonen må utføres nøye for nøkkelutvekslingen skal lykkes.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAOAEPKeyExchangeDeformatter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAOAEPKeyExchangeDeformatter"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAOAEPKeyExchangeDeformatter.SetKey%2A> to establish the key before calling <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAOAEPKeyExchangeDeformatter.DecryptKeyExchange%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAOAEPKeyExchangeDeformatter.SetKey%2A>til å opprette nøkkelen før du kaller <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAOAEPKeyExchangeDeformatter.DecryptKeyExchange%2A>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAOAEPKeyExchangeDeformatter.DecryptKeyExchange%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAOAEPKeyExchangeDeformatter.SetKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAOAEPKeyExchangeDeformatter"></xref> class with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAOAEPKeyExchangeDeformatter"> </xref> klassen med den angitte nøkkelen.

trans-unit.source: The instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"></xref> algorithm that holds the private key.
trans-unit.target: Forekomsten av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"> </xref> algoritmen som inneholder den private nøkkelen.

trans-unit.source: key is .
trans-unit.target: key is .

trans-unit.source: Extracts secret information from the encrypted key exchange data.
trans-unit.target: Trekker ut hemmelig informasjon fra krypterte nøkkelens utvekslingsnøkkel-data.

trans-unit.source: You must specify a key before calling this method.
trans-unit.target: Du må angi en nøkkel før du kaller opp denne metoden.

trans-unit.source: The key exchange data within which the secret information is hidden.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelens utvekslingsnøkkel-dataene i som hemmelige informasjonen er skjult.

trans-unit.source: The secret information derived from the key exchange data.
trans-unit.target: Hemmelig informasjonen avledet fra nøkkelens utvekslingsnøkkel-data.

trans-unit.source: The key exchange data verification has failed.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelens utvekslingsnøkkel data-bekreftelse mislyktes.

trans-unit.source: The key is missing.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen mangler.

trans-unit.source: Gets the parameters for the Optimal Asymmetric Encryption Padding (OAEP) key exchange.
trans-unit.target: Henter parameterne for nøkkelutvekslingen optimale asymmetrisk kryptering fylle (OAEP).

trans-unit.source: An XML string containing the parameters of the OAEP key exchange operation.
trans-unit.target: En XML-streng som inneholder parameterne for OAEP nøkkelens utvekslingsnøkkel-operasjon.

trans-unit.source: Sets the private key to use for decrypting the secret information.
trans-unit.target: Angir den private nøkkelen som brukes for dekryptering hemmelige informasjonen.

trans-unit.source: You must set a key before calling <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAOAEPKeyExchangeDeformatter.DecryptKeyExchange%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Du må angi en nøkkel før du kaller <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAOAEPKeyExchangeDeformatter.DecryptKeyExchange%2A>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAOAEPKeyExchangeDeformatter.DecryptKeyExchange%2A>

trans-unit.source: The instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"></xref> algorithm that holds the private key.
trans-unit.target: Forekomsten av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"> </xref> algoritmen som inneholder den private nøkkelen.

trans-unit.source: key is .
trans-unit.target: keyis .
